basic.description: Sociological perspectives of the relationship of law to social structure, the role of law in social action, law's role in social change, and discrimination and social inequality through law; emphasis is on contemporary systems in comparative and historical perspective.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Law and Social Structure

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prereq: Level 4 & reg in SOCY MAJ or MED & (a min grade of C in SOCY210, SOCY211, SOCY226 & SOCY227) & (a min GPA of 2.60 in SOCY210, SOCY211, SOCY226, SOCY227 & (a min GPA of 2.60 in all units in SOCY).
